.comMessageButton.description: Text displayed to consumer on a PDP page to direct them to chat

ConsumerClosedChatNotification.value: Nike bot notification: customer has closed the chat.
ConsumerClosedChatNotification.description: Message to athlete and consumer when consumer has closed chat window

EndConversationWeb.description: Button that allows consumer to end chat on web

WhileYouAreHere.value: While you're here, how can we help?

agentGreeting.value: Thanks for connecting with Nike. We're catching up with your messages and we'll be ready to help soon.
agentGreeting.description: Greeting when an agent has joined a chat.

blockedChatterMessage.description: Will be shown to consumers who try to chat in when they have been blocked.

botBeforeWeTransferYouMessage.value: Before we transfer you, tell us a little bit more. Any additional details (like an order number if you have one) can help us connect you with the right person.
botBeforeWeTransferYouMessage.description: Message sent before transfer to an Athlete.

botConfusedMessage.value: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Please try again.

botEnablePushNotifications.value: Please enable push notifications so you don't miss our messages.

botErrorMessage.value: Unfortunately, a system error occurred. Let us start again.

botInactivityMessaging.value: Due to a period of inactivity, this messaging session has been marked inactive.  Send another message to reconnect!
botInactivityMessaging.description: When a consumer doesn't respond for specified timeframe, messaging session goes inactive and they see this message.

botJustAMomentMessage.value: Thank you! We'll find someone for you in just a moment.

botNextPromptMessage.value: No problem! Choose from the following options to let us know how we can assist you best.
botNextPromptMessage.description: Bot Message when consumer has selected a value and another menu needs to be presented.

botNoAgentAvailable.value: Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment.
botNoAgentAvailable.description: When a consumer tries to transfer from Chat Bot to athlete, but no athlete is available, this message will show.

botOrderCancelMessage.value: If you act fast, you can cancel or change an order within 30 minutes of placing it. To cancel an order and get more information on our cancellation policies, the easiest way is to visit: {contextual nike.com country link}
botOrderCancelMessage.description: Order Cancel information - the {} refer to the nike.com link that is respective of the country and language being chatted.

botOutOfHoursMessage.value: Got it. Feel free to add more details while you wait. We'll be back to help during normal business hours
botOutOfHoursMessage.description: Message sent when consumer chats in and provides details outside of Athlete HOOPs

botSomethingElseTransferMessage.value: I'm going to transfer you to a Nike Expert who can help.
botSomethingElseTransferMessage.description: Something Else value selected transfer to Athlete

botTeammateWhatCanHelpWithMessage.value: What can my teammate help you with?

botTextOptOut.value: Text STOP to opt out of further messages.
botTextOptOut.description: Automated messaging to consumer if they want to opt out of further messages.

botTextOptOutReceived.value: You've opted out of receiving messages from us, so we won't contact you again.
botTextOptOutReceived.description: Message that will show after consumer has elected to opt out of messages.

botUpToSpeedMessage.value: Thank you! I'll find a Nike Expert to help you out. It'll just take a moment for them to get up to speed.

botWelcomeMessage.value: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹ I'm Nike Bot. I'll help connect you to the right Nike Expert.
botWelcomeMessage.description: Welcome Message from the Bot when a chat has initiated.

chatCantConnectRightNow.value:
We're sorry, we can't connect right now.
For immediate assistance, press OK to visit our Contact Us page.

chatSorryCantConnectRightNow.value: Sorry, we can't connect to chat right now

feelFreeToContactAgain.value: Feel free to contact us again if you need anything else. Have a wonderful day! ðŸŒŸ

foundOrder.value: Found it! I'll pull up your order.

happyToHelpOrder.value: I am happy to help you find your order status.

happyToHelpReturn.value: I am happy to help you find your return/refund status.

maxQueueMessage.value: Due to overwhelming volume, our Nike Team isn't available right now. Please try again later.

messageChatEnded.value: We're glad that we could assist you today. If you have more questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Keep an eye on your email for a survey. Your feedback helps us improve!
messageChatEnded.description: Message that will show once a messaging session has ended

noOrderFound.value: I wasn't able to find any orders using the information you provided.

orderstatusvalueOrderedNotYetShipped.description: order status of 'ordered, not yet shipped'

outOfHOOPsGreeting.value: Hi, [consumer first name]! Thanks for messaging us. Our Nike Experts aren't available at the moment, but we'll get back to you during our usual hours between [geo hours of operations]

outOfHoopsForNow.value: For now, you can track the status of your order or the status of your return. How can we help?

outOfHoopsMessage.value: Hello, [First Name]! Thanks for messaging us. We are unavailable at the moment. Meet us back here to message during normal business hours ([insert HOOP Hours]) and we'll be ready to assist you.

searchAnotherOrder.value: Do you want to search for another order?

searchAnotherReturn.value: Do you want to search for another Return?

termsAndConditions.value: Chats are monitored and recorded. View our Privacy Policy.
termsAndConditions.description: Terms and Conditions on Pre Chat page. [Privacy Policy] will be hyperlinked to the privacy policy for the regions.

thanksForReachingOut.value: Thanks for reaching out to Nike!

tooltipRequired.description: When hovering over field on pre chat page, this will show for required fields

tooltipSendMessage.description: When hovering over 'Send Button' this text will show

trackAdditionalItems.value: Do you want to track additional items from this order?

trackAnotherOrderOrReturn.value: Do you want to track another order or return?

tryAgainOrNikeTeammates.value: I can try looking again with different information, or I can find one of my Nike Teammates to further assist you.

trySearchAgain.value: I can try looking again with different information. Would you like to search again?

valueCancelOrChangeOrder.description: Cancel or Change Order Intent Value

valueCustomizationNikeByYou.description: Customization / Nike By You intent value

valueIssuesWithItems.description: Issues with Delivered Items Intent Value

whatLikeToTrack.value: What would you like to track?

whichItemInOrderList.value: Which item would you like to track?

yesFurtherHelp.value: Yes, I want to chat with a Nike Expert.
